com.ibasco.agql.core.transport.pool

Interface NettyChannelPool

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FixedNettyChannelPool, SimpleNettyChannelPool

    public interface NettyChannelPool
extends Closeable
    Enhanced version of netty's ChannelPool interface with CompletableFuture support.
    Author:
    Rafael Luis Ibasco

    • Nested Class Summary

    • Method Detail

      • tryRelease

        static CompletableFuture<Boolean> tryRelease(io.netty.channel.Channel channel)
        Attempts to release the Channel if it is pooleed.
        Parameters:
        channel - The Channel to release
        Returns:
        A CompletableFuture which is notified once the operation is marked as completed. A value of true will be returned if the Channel was released, otherwise false if the Channel is not pooled or if the release operation was unsuccessful. The returned future will never complete exceptionally.

      • getPool

        static NettyChannelPool getPool(io.netty.channel.Channel channel)
        Retrieve the NettyChannelPool which was used to acquire the specified Channel
        Parameters:
        channel - The Channel to be used as lookup
        Returns:
        The NettyChannelPool or null if the Channel was not acquired from a NettyChannelPool

      • release

        CompletableFuture<Void> release(io.netty.channel.Channel channel)
        Release a Channel back to this NettyChannelPool. The returned Future is notified once the release is successful and failed otherwise. When failed the Channel will automatically closed.
        Parameters:
        channel - a Channel object
        Returns:
        a CompletableFuture object

      • isPooled

        static boolean isPooled(io.netty.channel.Channel channel)
        Checks if the Channel is currectly pooled
        Parameters:
        channel - The Channel to be used as lookup
        Returns:
        true if the Channel has been acquired from a NettyChannelPool

      • acquire

        CompletableFuture<io.netty.channel.Channel> acquire(InetSocketAddress remoteAddress)
        Acquire a Channel from this NettyChannelPool. The returned CompletableFuture is notified once the acquire is successful and failed otherwise. Its important that an acquired is always released to the pool again, even if the Channel is explicitly closed..
        Parameters:
        remoteAddress - The remote address to connect to
        Returns:
        a CompletableFuture object

      • acquire

        CompletableFuture<io.netty.channel.Channel> acquire(InetSocketAddress remoteAddress,
                                                    CompletableFuture<io.netty.channel.Channel> promise)
        Acquire a Channel from this NettyChannelPool. The returned CompletableFuture is notified once the acquire is successful and failed otherwise. Its important that an acquired is always released to the pool again, even if the Channel is explicitly closed..
        Parameters:
        remoteAddress - The remote address to connect to
        promise - The CompletableFuture that is notified once the acquire operation is complete.
        Returns:
        a CompletableFuture object

      • release

        CompletableFuture<Void> release(io.netty.channel.Channel channel,
                                CompletableFuture<Void> promise)
        Release a Channel back to this NettyChannelPool. The given Promise is notified once the release is successful and failed otherwise. When failed the Channel will automatically closed.
        Parameters:
        channel - a Channel object
        promise - a CompletableFuture object
        Returns:
        a CompletableFuture object

      • getSize

        getSize.

        Returns:
        a int
